functions.name: FastAsciiConvert
functions.logic: Converts a string from ASCII to lowercase or uppercase based on the template parameter `is_lower`.  It iterates through the input string `src` up to `length` and converts each character, writing the result to `dst`.  The `changed_out` parameter indicates whether any characters were actually converted.  The template parameter `is_lower` dictates if the conversion is to lowercase (true) or uppercase (false).
